Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: argentinevisitor
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 nights, room was a bit small but had everything we needed. Nice neighborhood near everything.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: Scrabidee
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel for (2) days after a cruise. Everything about this place was all good. Was dropped off by a cabbie at the wrong Holiday Inn about a mile away. They notified this HIE and was picked up by a very nice young lady. They were very helpful and courteous in helping us get around on public transportation. The complimentary breakfast was good. The rooms were very clean and the beds were comfy. I would definitely recommend this place to all and would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely dedicated service”
Reviews.Author: Roberto D
Reviews.Content: I would like to share the excellent service received ffrom the staff at my arrival Miss Janairy, at the reception solved each and all requests and questions with knowledge, enthusiasm and total disposition My family and I would like to thank and recognize this kind of attitude and professionalism

Reviews.Title: “The best to quick trip.”
Reviews.Author: Juan L
Reviews.Content: Very close from Airport, good cooffe and with free parking.

Reviews.Title: “Travelling Finns”
Reviews.Author: Svea Christerss... C
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel only 1 night (first we spent 1 week at Miami Beach Eden Rock hotel (wonderful!) and then 5 nights at the Caribbean sea cruise ship. Loved this hotel and especially Beatriz, who took us under her arms, even though we were too early at the hotel. She brought us food and insisted that my husband also ate his portion... Special thanks to our "chauffor" Lady, unfortunately we don't remember her name. A very good hotel with a very good location! Beatriz: You are unforgettable <3 Greetings from Finland!

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: frequent_trave
Reviews.Content: This is not the greatest of the chain. I wouldn't recommend this particular. Holiday Inn to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great Overnighter”
Reviews.Author: Travellingnurse1959
Reviews.Content: This hotel is new and clean,clean. It has a nice pool and is only about 10 minutes from the airport. It has convienent airport pick up and a plentiful breakfast. You are only a two block walk from several restauraunts. It was very quiet at night. You do not hear any planes or traffic. The check in was fast and the staff pleasant.We arrived late and ordered take out pizza on the recommendation of a staff member. It was great. We used this as a stayover prior to a cruise. They have convienent transfer available to the pier with several departure times and a low 10.00 per person fee. All in all we will stay there again when cruising or as a stopover to sun destinations.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Nice!”
Reviews.Author: ptwhite2000
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night before leaving for a cruise out of the port of Miami. We were able to leave our car here for the week and the price included a shuttle to the port. We had to pay for the shuttle back to the hotel (a week later), but the driver (Sammy) was friendly, courteous, and much better than waiting in the long lines for a taxi! Most of the staff were very friendly and helpful. They have laundry facilities which was helpful for us since we were traveling for several weeks. Breakfast was typical but decent. The room was comfortable and relatively quiet. We would stay here again when cruising out of Miami!

Reviews.Title: “One night stop after flying in to Miami”
Reviews.Author: MBRECED
Reviews.Content: Our flight arrival was late enough that we decided to find a hotel nearby for the night and go back to the airport and pick up a car rental the next day to start our vacation. This hotel had free shuttle back and forth to the airport, as well as a free breakfast. It was perfect for what we wanted. The shuttle worked very well, and in fact the driver was willing to drop us off at the car rental center, vs at the airport where we would have to make our way there. The hotel was clean and the employees were friendly. There was a small pool area outside that looked well maintained, but not what I would consider a vacation spot! If the circumstances repeated themselves, I wouldn't hesitate to use this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “overpriced, bring your earplugs”
Reviews.Author: koivo
Reviews.Content: i only had 2 nights before travelling elsewhere and arriving late just wanted something close to the airport. Looked at the cheaper options but the reviews were bad and the ones for here were good so I thought the extra cost might be worth it. First night was ok, was really tired but the second night could not get sleep from all the noise. The fridge, other rooms, the truck parked on the street next to the hotel that fired up its cooling unit every half hour, the planes - I expected a better sound proofing being close to the airport. The breakfast was scary. Shuttle from airport is not available after 11pm. Positives, the place is clean (relatively), relatively new, pool clean (surrounds though had cigarette butts), free shuttle to airport. But overall its more in the price range of the others 120 us per night, not 200+

Reviews.Title: “Great value and hotel”
Reviews.Author: Patti24
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Holiday Inn Express Doral for one night while connecting flights. We got in early in the morning and called for the shuttle which came in about 45 minutes. Arrive at the hotel, but our room wasn't ready, so we had the express breakfast . . . which was surprisingly good -- eggs, sausage, bagels, yogurt, hot/cold cereal, muffins and their cinnamon rolls. The best part was we had a whole day and we took the hotel shuttle back to the airport, hopped on the #150 to South Beach for $5 for a day pass and spent the day sunning on the beach and exploring South Beach. It was great! Took the bus back to the airport, called the hotel and the shuttle showed up 30 minutes later and took us back. The staff is very friendly and there's even a small fitness center. For the money -- this is a great place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel under flight pattern”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a cheaprooms.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Hotel is fine, but location next to the airport puts airplanes flying in for a landing with their approach about 400ft above your head. We slept fine, but there must be some hotels of equal quality in better locations. However, if you want to stay close to the airport, this is close to highways.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Accomodations”
Reviews.Author: Sharon B
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival at the Airport, I contacted the hotel and they sent a Van to pick us up. The only problem is that when it got to us, it was full! We were advised that it would be about 45 minutes before he could return for us. He gave us the option to take a cab and get reimbursed by the hotel, which he opted to do. A couple of restaurants within walking distance for dinner was a plus. The stay overnight was good and a nice breakfast in the morning. We were able to get Shuttle service back to the airport the next morning without any problems.

Reviews.Title: “Good location and GREAT Staff”
Reviews.Author: candicaswell
Reviews.Content: This hotel is near the Miami airport with free transportation - Claudia the driver was pleasant and professional. The rooms are clean and a good size. The free breakfast has hot items like scrambled eggs, sausage, and hot cinnamon buns. Beatriz, the breakfast lady is so helpful and ready to get you whatever you need. The swimming pool is clean and well kept with lots of lounges and chairs. A wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable Accomodations, nice staff, convenient location!”
Reviews.Author: Triplane_Guy
Reviews.Content: Travel to other locations is easy from this central location. Staff was very friendly and accomodating, and Beatriz had ensured that the morning breakfast was always hot, fresh and replenished. Like all southern Florida hotels that I've stayed at, the Air Conditioning in the room has a unique smell that those of us from the northwest can't appreciate. Wifi was always up, and having a printer in the lobby was helpful and convenient. I'd definately recommend to friends or co-workers travelling to the area.

Reviews.Title: “Good experience, staff was great”
Reviews.Author: Grimy G
Reviews.Content: Clean, quiet and spacious rooms, a good breakfast, free Wi Fi available. Although the hotel is close to the airport we didn't hear the planes. We would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: carlos c
Reviews.Content: We specialy remember Mrs Beatriz who went out of her way to please us and the front desk personnel who were very kind and informative. We will recomend to all our friends, associates and family. Sincerely, Carlos Cardona

Reviews.Title: “Conveniently located for a cruise”
Reviews.Author: belleretraite
Reviews.Content: We selected this hotel prior to a cruise departing from Miami port because 1) it was not too expensive 2) it offered a free shuttle service from the airport 3) it offered a shuttle service to the Miami Port which was less expensive ($10 p/p) than taking a taxi ($25) The rooms were clean , quiet and spacious and free Wi Fi available and fast . Breakfast was included , not elaborate but warm and plentiful . The hotel is located close to the airport , there are some family-type restaurants close by but the closest liquor store is about 9 blocks away or a 30 minutes walk

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic & Personable-A great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: rdub54
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here before and after our cruise. Beats the high price and negative reviews on downtown hotels near the beach area we found on the web. We cannot say enough positive remarks about the staff, amenities and the atmosphere here at the motel. The staff were fantastic and personable. The room was clean, neat and the bed was so comfortable we did not want to get out of it. Betty, one of the staff there was so personable and informative of the Miami area for us to visit. She gave us information on Bayside shopping district to visit before our cruise. Then after our cruise. The staff took us to the airport to catch a city bus to visit downtown Miami at South Beach area for shopping and the bus returned us to the airport for the hotel to pick us back up. This kept us away from the high charge of taxi fare. I would recommend if you are timid of the culture of city tranist and cannot stand the overcrowding it would not be for you. This was so efficient and as a penny pincher as we are it fit our needs. It gave us an overlook view of South Beach area and the culture and shopping area, even though we are not much shoppers. Then Rena' (sorry if spelling is not right) was also very helpful and a personable young man. The hotel's breakfast was great for a free breakfast. The only negative thing about the hotel would be the heavy traffic area around the hotel. Always felt safe. The landscape around the hotel was beautiful. We would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service”
Reviews.Author: campal
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel while on business. The location was good and the room was clean and quiet. When I checked in the clerk was extremely welcoming both in his interaction with me and his helpfulness in getting me checked in - bonus was a goodie bag with water and trail mix. Another star for the customer service is when I ran out of toothpaste, they were very accommodating. The food was average for the hotel chain - would have preferred more healthful options.

Reviews.Title: “Good standard and convenient to the airport”
Reviews.Author: Don35
Reviews.Content: Fine for an overnight stay and very convenient to the airport. Courteous, friendly and efficient employees. There was a terrible smell of Lysol or some such detergent in the first room they allocated to me and when I called down to request a change, they immediately sent someone up with a new keycard for a different room. There's a Carino's about two blocks away if you need something to eat. All told, a good experience for a quick business trip.

Reviews.Title: “Okay hotel for a stayover”
Reviews.Author: HatRez
Reviews.Content: We rented this room the night before we left for a cruise. We arrived at 11:30 p.m. and called immediately for the shuttle. He said it would arrive shortly. A half hour later, after watching other shuttles come and go, we called again. He said it would be there soon. We waited another 20 minutes and he said it had already been there and gone... which he wasn't because we hadn't moved. It was almost 1 a.m. by the time the shuttle showed up. Just know for reference that there are several HIE and HIs in the Miami area so you may not be calling the correct one. Be sure to confirm on the phone the address of the hotel. The room was fine, we ended up being there only 6 hours by the time we actually got to check in.

Reviews.Title: “excelent agent Beatriz”
Reviews.Author: Anaide F
Reviews.Content: Excelent hotel, conform bed, woonderfull breakfast area,

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: samualee
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great. Check in was easy and rooms were clean. White bedding so you know if it is clean or not. Room and Bathroom normal size. Lots of hot water and good water pressure. A/C worked well at cooling room down. When you are getting help from the desk clerk, clarify everything. We got them to call us a cab for a restaurant that ended up(much to our surprise and embarassment) to be only a block and a half away. Not a big deal, though. Breakfast was delicious and goood coffee at all hours.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay”
Reviews.Author: mcjolley
Reviews.Content: Heres the good - Nice room - Comfortable bed - friendly and helpful staff - good breakfast - flat screen and paper - walk to restaraunts - The got to live with it - on the hiway gets a bit noisy at night - cant go wrong staying here for a short time.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: highjul
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here twice for business. The staff have been extremely friendly on both occasions. The rooms have been clean and fairly comfortable, although my mattress felt a bit old the second time around. There are very large flat screen TVs in all rooms. There are various restaurants in the area to walk/drive to or to have delivered. The hotel has a nice pool area. It's been pretty quiet and has free internet. They have a free airport shuttle. The first time I stayed there, the shuttle was in the shop, so they reimbursed me up to $25 for a cab. There's free breakfast downstairs every morning, which is your standard HIX breakfast. All in all, there's nothing over the top about it, but I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good service!”
Reviews.Author: kathton
Reviews.Content: We arrived very late on a Sunday night at Miami International - don't ever do that! The place is a ghost town, with no one to help you when you aren't familiar with the US systems. We had a reservation, and tried to call the hotel to arrange for the shuttle to collect us but there was no answer. We waited outside for the bus, hoping it would come by, but no. Tried calling again - no answer. Eventually, we had no choice but to take a cab, that cost us $27! When we arrived, tired and angry, the man of the front desk was very polite and explained that the phone had been ringing at his end, but when he picked it up, the line was dead. So that explained what the problem had been. We had a short but good night's sleep - comfortable bed, clean room etc (although the air con was rather loud) - and a pleasant breakfast (I liked the coffee!). Flo, on the front desk, was very helpful in sorting out some quarters for me to use the laundry, and even replaced the ones I put in the wrong slot, free of charge! So then, I decided to ask about having a refund for the taxi. Initially, Flo told me that it wasn't possible because we were travelling after 11.30pm and their shuttle only runs until that time. I was pretty sure that, on the main travel sites that I use to research hotels, there was no mention of this, and I was then shown through to speak to the manager. She was extremely empathetic, and immediately did a search on the website I had used...and indeed, the first line of the description of the hotel was "Free airport shuttle"! with no mention of limited hours. She immediately assured me that they would refund the $27, and actually thanked me for pointing out this error! I was very impressed with her response. Many thanks! She restored my faith in the ability of large companies to be flexible in their policies!

Reviews.Title: “THE VERY BEST PLACE TO STAY PRIOR TO CRUISING!”
Reviews.Author: BWheelerRN
Reviews.Content: I had the pleasure of staying two nights at the MIAMI AIRPORT DORAL AREA with a large group of friends before and after our cruise. I canâ€™t say enough good things about the hotel and the staff. Gerry at the front desk was amazing â€“ very helpful with an ever-present, beautiful smile. Our rooms were very clean and comfy! Management staff, Jenny Black and Edgar, were both very helpful as well and assured us our stay would be perfectâ€¦it was! The shuttle from the airport is free while the shuttle to the port was a very reasonable $10/person. I speak for our entire group when I say this is the best place to stay prior to cruising!

Reviews.Title: “Good base/room and staff!”
Reviews.Author: drdanielmacdonald
Reviews.Content: Had a 3 night stay here as a travelling UK couple. Obviously out of town, near the airport. No problems with airplane noise and a good room with 2 queen beds. Aircon worked...a little noisy but no worries. Room had a fridge, the wifi was good and free. Used the laundry self-service and was good at $2 for wash and $2 for dry (Bring your own detergent and save $1.25) Breakfast was a good spread, as in every HI Express I've stayed in the US. Beatriz was very friendly and helpful in the breakfast room..a real character! Would defo stay again...a good base for the area and 1/2 mile to the freeway. A 20 minute drive to southbeach. There is a BK, an italian kind of restaurant and another restaurant within 5 minutes walk along the street.

Reviews.Title: “my 11/4/11 trip”
Reviews.Author: Butch M
Reviews.Content: Extremely comfortable bed. Clean room and breakfast area. The breakfast area was a little small for the volume but moved smoothly. We picked this spot for price and central location between airport and ship terminal. Was the way to go with transportation from airport and to ship terminal. We had talked to driver about ride to airport but could not connect on return. Walking distance to great Italian restaurant and Walgreen's and CVS

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: Carmen R
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the hotel was great! The staff was very helpful especially Beatriz and Javier. Whenever we needed something they were there to assist! They're VERY pleasant and always had a smile. Complementary breakfast was delicious! Room was spacious. We would definitely stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: mismymts1
Reviews.Content: we really enjoyed this holiday inn express and the breakfast was enjoyable especially the fresh fruit bowl. everything was very clean and the room was spacious. i always appreciate the mini fridge but no room safe. had a very nice pool area and i would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Ineabelle
Reviews.Content: The service was excellent and The staff was very helpful.The hotel and rooms were well maintained and clean. The hotel is also in a very centralized location. The only inconvenient I had was that the room key didn't work but the maintenance gentleman Carlos was very helpful and was able to take care of the issue right away.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: roger b
Reviews.Content: Stayed for eight days at this hotel and was pleased with the service given. Rooms were clean, breakfast while not grand was worth it just get there earlier than 10.00am. The staff was friendly, especially the kitchen staff who made us feel welcomed and attended to our needs. I would recommend for vacation or short stay, especially the pool area which was so relaxing. The hotel exceeded my expectations both in terms of price and service and was definitely value for money. Roger Trinidad, West Indies

Reviews.Title: “Worst HOTEL TO STAY ! CHEATERS ! LIARS !”
Reviews.Author: agarw395
Reviews.Content: all customers be careful . The hotel staff is a liar and they have all these hidden charges and cost and they cheat people and rip them off ! be careful before you get ripped off.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, service and facility”
Reviews.Author: Hank C
Reviews.Content: One of the most friendly staff ever. Especially the lady named Beatriz. I'll definately come back next time! Recommended for people coming to Miami for business or just vacation in the Doral area.

Reviews.Title: “Very impresed with the facility and especially the roon service by staff especially Beatriz”
Reviews.Author: BillRoots
Reviews.Content: Worth trying for Miami trips it is a good location and offered good service

Reviews.Title: “"Great customer service"”
Reviews.Author: Ivette R
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to say that customer service in this Holiday Inn Express is great. Thanks to Victor and Kenneth I always had what I needed. Every time I needed towels I didn't had to wait because Kenneth helped me out. Victor also helped me with my luggage and called a taxi for me. Having customer service like this people definitely want to go back. Thank You

Reviews.Title: “It was ok, people is so friendly”
Reviews.Author: TripsFl
Reviews.Content: Cleanliness and front desk service is good, I was expecting a brand new building, but it was ok. It is an average hotel, good price for 4 people incluiding breakfast, just 25 minutes from Miami Beach and Downtown Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, great staff, great breakfast.....”
Reviews.Author: 54lillian
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great, the staff are really kind and make you feel home, they were very helpful with us, though we stayed there two times, still is one of the best Holidays we've been. The buffet breakfast is like Dennis, they have pancakes, waffles, fruits, yogurts,juices etc., fabulous; no complaint at all. Janairy and all the staff made our day great ,and we would return without a doubt to this hotel over and over again, thanks for your help and congragulations for the excellent work of you all. Lillian R. Padilla

Reviews.Title: “An ok Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ianwilliams99
Reviews.Content: A reasonable hotel about 15 minute drive from Miami airport. Fould the staff to be surly on arrival and the small pool was overtaken by a huge riotous family that were clearly out of control and causing concerns to the hotel staff but nothing was done. Asking for towells for the pool was met with a sigh from the guy on reception......sorry!! but I only asked for a towell!!!! Good Italian restaurant in walking distance but at $110 a night, wouldn't stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED it, RECOMMEND it, and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Selene11417
Reviews.Content: Location: Close to downtown and Miami Beach! Amenities: Great breakfast, nice pool and good fitness center. People: VERY FRIENDLY and always excited to help you. I recommend this place to all persons traveling in Miami Florida and looking for a great place to stay at a good cost. Very clean and what makes this hotel pleasant are the workers. THANK YOU Beatriz for your friendliness and attention.

Reviews.Title: “I like it very much, I want come back soon!!!”
Reviews.Author: jfdelcid77
Reviews.Content: The attention was very good, the people works in this Hotel is so cool, very kind....and I really enjoy my night in this hotel.....

Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: jrlmap
Reviews.Content: in order to take advantage of an inexpensive flight on Copa Air to Panama city - i stayed here on both ends of trip and left my car in parking lot and took free shuttle to Miami airport. staff was very courteous, shuttle was prompt and room was nice.

Reviews.Title: “Met our needs”
Reviews.Author: sapphireberry
Reviews.Content: My husband and I needed a place to stay near the airport in Miami for one night- and this fit the bill fine. The free breakfast was typical, and the shuttle service got us to the airport promptly in the morning. Staff was very helpful and polite. The hotel had everything I expected- free shuttle, free breakfast, free wifi, and a clean room.

Reviews.Title: “Five Star Quality in Holiday Inn, Express”
Reviews.Author: ildauraclaus
Reviews.Content: Kudos to a truly professional staff and amazing customer services. They were always on top of things. The whole staff was attentive, friendly and very helpful. They always answer a question whether it was how to get to the mall, resturantes in the area or the quickest way to get to Key West. Definetly a place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “personal attention with a smile”
Reviews.Author: choti1972
Reviews.Content: Wonderful stay at holiday inn, lovely lady named beatrice helped us enjoy our stay even more. We were stranded in miami once our flight was delayed. With only our carry-on and not enough diapers left for my niece, the front desk was kind enough to give us a ride to the nearest Walgreens for essentials.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, awesome staff”
Reviews.Author: CalgaryNomad
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 1 night before our cruise and 2 nights after. Having read some of the other reviews, we did take a room on the 2nd floor for the 1 night stay. We did have issues with the toilet "leaking" and when my husband mentioned it to the front desk they were very apologetic and as the room was prepaid, offered us bonus points as a credit for the inconvenience. When we returned after our cruise, we took a room on the first floor. The room was much larger than the one on the 2nd floor and was super quiet. Once again the front desk staff was fantastic. As this time we had a rental vehicle, we asked the front desk staff of a good place to go eat and Kenneth recommended an awesome place to go. Kenneth was very knowledgeable and if you asked for directions to go somewhere, he would give you the best & easiest route so you would not get lost. I have stayed at other Holiday Inns and have always been impressed with the breakfasts they serve. I also appreciate the availability of being able to get complimentary tea and coffee any time of the day.

Reviews.Title: “Free Shuttle and Breakfast Offers Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Demi_8
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one night after a cruise as we were flying out of MIA. ROOM: we had a room with two comfortable queen beds and it was spacious, clean and offered plenty of storage space solutions. The tub and toilet is in a separate room with a door that can be closed so that another person can use the basin/counter area which is very large. ROOM LOCATION: Do not, I repeat, do not agree to a room on the ground floor if you like it quiet. We were in a rush at the desk and agreed to it but didn't bother changing rooms because it would have been too much of a hassle as one family member had already fallen asleep and our luggage was opened. It was very loud on the ground floor as you could hear voices until quite late at night coming from the lobby, doors opening and closing, cleaning staff moving about, and in the early morning the same noises again. There was also some kind of permanent light shining into our window while we slept and the worst part was that the drapes could not be drawn closed to block the light. Fortunately, we were dead tired enough to sleep through the whole night. I don't know how many floors are in this hotel but if you stay here insist on a higher floor away from the noisy area. SHUTTLE: we returned our rental car to the airport the night before our flight. We called for the shuttle to pick us to bring us back to the hotel. We used the shuttle again the next morning to take us to the airport. No problems at all â€“ the shuttle was quick and efficient. Make sure to ask what is written on the side of the shuttle so you know what to look for. BREAKFAST: complimentary and good selection that includes a few hot items. The cinnamon buns are warm and delicious. SERVICE & INTERNET: used one of the two computers in the lobby to print off our boarding passes. The ink on the printer was gone and I told the front desk. They were quick to respond by replacing the ink cartridge. No extra charge to print. We would stay at this hotel again but on a higher floor.

Reviews.Title: “NIce Holiday inn Express”
Reviews.Author: hotelguest10001
Reviews.Content: this is a nice holiday inn express if you want to be near doral airport area. i have stayed there few time on and off and will return to this hotel when in the area again. i fly from NYC to miami at least once a month for 2 or 3 days and i normally find a Holiday inn everywhere i go.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: BenLI
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at this hotel and I was still pleased. I lived in the area of Doral and after moving I needed a convenient place to stay while traveling in between my new home and my old home. This hotel was quiet and clean. My kids and I enjoyed the free breakfast buffet. Sometimes a simple selection of foods for breakfast is enough to make a traveler smile. The rooms were spacious, the beds comfortable, the staff friendly. We did not use the pool but it looked clean. This hotel is a reasonable distance to Miami airport, but I did not use the shuttle service. Plenty of restaurants around the area that's walking distance. The hotel had a small pantry near the customer service desk that sold various items. This came in handy for a late night snack. Also, I always enjoy free internet when I travel. It beats having to pay $20 a day at most other local hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed before and after cruise”
Reviews.Author: planegirl
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 1 night before our cruise and 1 night after. Both times we received good customer service. Our rooms were clean and comfortable. This will be our choice next time we cruise from Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: Puneet125
Reviews.Content: I have visited on a Business trip on January 2010. The hotel room quality is good with economical rates. However,it is located at lonely place and no access to restaurants and bars. The worst part is that there is no restaurant to dine in this hotel. I will suggest you to go for different Holiday inn hotel at Miami if you really want to enjoy.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for $$”
Reviews.Author: SarnyCay
Reviews.Content: stayed for 2 short nights, but enjoyed the staff, location, free breakfast and most of all, very reasonable cab fare when ordered from the front desk ($17 to Dolphin Mall).

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Alex3789
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on a stopover. The ro was clean but reeked from way too many cleaning chemicals. Service was mediocre - not great bur not awful. A smile at check in and out would have been nice. The front desk was not helpful with recommendations for the area. But all in all good value for money if you want a clean place to lay your head for the night

Reviews.Title: “Two Hour Wait for Shuttle from Airport to Hotel”
Reviews.Author: GoVikes2011
Reviews.Content: And then they lied and said he had driven around the airport several times. Odd - we saw every other hotel shuttle go by several times. We flagged down other Holiday Inn shuttles just to see if we were looking for the wrong shuttle After about a half an hour we called, then we called again, then we called again and again - and were told he was driving around. (note - they didn't say driving around the airport - that should have been a clue.....). Finally after 1 hour and 50 minutes the person who answered the phone told us to take a cab. What do you know - the shuttle drove up just then. The driver was on the phone with the hotel who must have told him there was another couple to be picked up. Because after waiting for just shy of two hours. we left the airport only to circle back around to look for the other couple. Their wait time - 2 minutes. We are pretty laid back folks and it takes quite a bit to get us worked up. This was too much. The desk was not sympathetic nor apologetic. "He kept driving around." Sure he did. I ran off a litany of the 100 other shuttles we had seen but he didn't care. Will see what the manager has to say in the morning. Have to be at the airport by 10AM. Better leave now. At this point nothing else matters about this place - wish there were negative numbesr to rate this place. And if you do decide to stay here, start walking.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: BenitoDelicias
Reviews.Content: We needed a place to say before our trip to NYC. It was a nice stay. Good rooms, two beds, a nice chair, a desk with chair, huge tv, iron, etc. Nice clean bathroom and great beds. I had stayed at this hotel before it became a Holiday Inn and the improvements are there. The hotel is nicer, has a better look and it's very well located. The only problem is the sink outside of the bathroom, but other than that, it's very good for the price we paid.

Reviews.Title: “Clean room, comfortable beds and good location”
Reviews.Author: veronicac518
Reviews.Content: I went to Miami to visit friends with my husband and my boys. We decided on this hotel because the price was right and it had good reviews. The hotel is located on a busy street, close to the airport and a lot of restaurants/supermarkets. It isn't near the tourist areas but it's conveniently located between the turnpike and the 836 highway which take you anywhere you want to go in Miami quickly, as long as there isn't traffic of course. We went to Sough Beach and it was about a 15-20 min drive which I didn't mind. The hotel itself doesn't have a lot of ammenities. Just the basics. They have a nice size lobby, business center, pool, gym, laundry room and a breakfast area. The room was a little bit small but it was very clean which is extremely important for me at least. The beds were really comfortable and also very clean. The beds come with 2 "soft" and 2 "firm" pillows that are labeled and the room also had a flat screen tv and a mini fridge. The a/c worked great and there's free WI-FI in the rooms! The hallway is a bit noisy though and on my way to and from our room I heard people inside some of the rooms a couple of times but once in the room, it was quiet despite being near the airport and a busy street. They also offer free hot breakfast each morning which was a plus. The service was good too. I didn't really require any service but every employee would say hi and smile when we walked by them which was always nice. I would definitely recommend this to people that are looking for a clean hotel that don't mind to drive to and from the tourist locations and want restaurant options as well as fast food places near by. I would stay there again for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Very good people, especially the Hotel...”
Reviews.Author: Adesola82
Reviews.Content: Very good people, especially the Hotel manager. Nice hot breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: angela1971
Reviews.Content: A couple of weeks ago I was there with my family and I have to say that I felt at home...the hotel's employees are great! they help us out with all we need and more...restaurant recommendations, maps, attractions, entertainment, etc...I definitely recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “LOCATION IN SHOPPING AREA”
Reviews.Author: izari
Reviews.Content: We took this hotel since the other hotel we originally wantd had no availability and this was near the malls.The trip was just for shopping and the hotel is near the malls we wanted. The rooms are ok,they have a good size, but they dont offer nothing special. The hotel definetively needs to do some renovation. The elevator looks really old. The lobby area and the breakfast area look old. The staff on the reception were not helpful at all. Since we arrived quite early the room wasnt ready yet, we needed to leave but we just wanted to leave our bags in the hotel to do some things without having to worry that they were in the car. The reception lady completely refused even tough we were coming back a few hours later. In the end after a while discussing they agreed. We have stayed in other hotels in the area for the same price but with best quality in the rooms and in general.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service, nice people.”
Reviews.Author: david463
Reviews.Content: We chose this Holiday Inn because it was close to the airport and we came in after cruising for one week. We cabbed it to the hotel - a word of advice, when taking your cab be certain that they are taking you to the correct address of the hotel you are staying. We arrived very early and we waited for a bit for our room because I had requested two beds and a pull out as there was three of us...they accomodated our room request and checked us in well before check in time. They took us to the Dolphin mall complimentary (cab is around $20 each way) and picked us up as well as getting us to the airport on time the next morning. They were so nice, it was great. They also had free internet and printer in the lobby so I could do my web check in and print my boarding passes! The room was large, clean and fairly basic, but was exactly what we wanted. Would stay here again in a minute.

Reviews.Title: “Close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: emmarrakech
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel just for the night. We came in late, the receptionist suggested us a sportsbar nearby for dinner which was great. Near Dolphin Mall. We had a clean, nice and confortable room. A very nice option if you need a hotel near the airport and don't want to spend a fortune.

Reviews.Title: “So so place, just okay.”
Reviews.Author: pinkdolphi
Reviews.Content: The lobby was very nice and the staff seemed friendly enough. The room: found a hair on the underside of the pillow and the faucet leaked non-stop unless you hit a specific spot as you turn the knob. The mirror had spots and there were old toothpaste spots (from other guests) on the frame around the mirror, yuck. The free shampoo, soap, and conditioner was Bath and Body Works and very nice! The beds looked way smaller than queen....barely looked like a full sized bed. One of our party got a smoking room: the hallway smelled terrible. However, their room smelled fine.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel,LOUSY SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: Jonah02
Reviews.Content: Stayed here prior to cruising.Main reason for choosing this hotel was 24 hour free shuttle service,what a joke that is. First when you call they say they will take you anywhere within a 5 mile radius but omit to tell you the restrictions such as"we only go to the mall at 1pm and pick up at 8pm. Airport service stopped in the evening almost stranded my daughter at the airport as she came in after us, we had to kick up to get them to fetch her. First room they gave us stunk of urine and smoke,this was a non smoking room. Breakfast was usual express fare, quite good but cold. Do not expect too much if you stay here,best have your own transportation as nothing close by. We are about to rent a car just to get out of here ASAP.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for location”
Reviews.Author: yellowfad
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel the night before our cruise. The rate was $90 for a Sunday night. There was a free shuttle from the airport to the hotel. The room and the bathroom was very clean. The bathroom was really large. Free breakfast was included. Would stay here again if I needed to be near the cruise ports.

Reviews.Title: “Found a interesting note of previous traveller....”
Reviews.Author: dreadlockjack
Reviews.Content: In general, this hotel would be fine, it's average with nice rooms. Unfortunately, we have found a note from previous traveller in our bed: "If you find this note, the bed has not be changed by housekeeping...". Hmmm..... this didn't leave a good impression on us. Front desk staff wasn't very impressed and helpful about that and just handed us out new blankets... Otherwise it was clean, breakfast ok. Wouldn't stay there again due the bad experience...

Reviews.Title: “More Cons, than Pros”
Reviews.Author: valeria3984
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 2 weeks because it was affordable, compared to other Miami hotels. We definately won't do this again. The things we liked were the front desk service, the pool, and daily breakfast. But that's where the pros end. Now for the cons: the parking lot leads through the pool area, so you get the occasional gawker, the front desk staff said that they had room service, all you had to do was dial 0. We tried to get room service repeateadly to no avail. There was never any answer and then the line got cut off. We talked to the front desk about this and they said that "room service" is actually a restaurant offsite and to keep trying because they might be busy. We tried again and again and the same thing happened, until we just gave up. So this hotel says they have room service when in fact, they dont. Another thing, the maids aren't professional enough. On one occasion we returned to our room to get something we forgot and we saw the maid watching a soap opera in spanish while cleaning our room! This was unacceptable. On another ocassion another maid was talking loudly on her cellphone while cleaning the bathroom. And we encountered them numerous times in the elevator and all they do is just stare at you without greeting you, so we have to say hi in order to kill the ackwardness. All in all our experience at this hotel was very disappointing, we wished we had stayed at a better place.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Bargain, Great Spot”
Reviews.Author: scbleo
Reviews.Content: Located off 826 and right by the Miami Airport, this newer hotel is small, clean, and a great deal. With wireless internet, free parking, pool, fitness center, free hot breakfast, and clean modern 2-queen or 1-king bedrooms with mini-refrigerator, this is a gem in an older area of Miami. The location is ideal when traveling for short stays with family or overnights. Only complaint is of our two queen beds, mine had a major dip in the middle that made for an uncomfortable sleep. My son's bed was firm, and my mom and brother who slept in another 2Q bdroom, had firm beds. So I guess, we were the only ones with the dip bed. Since it was one night, and there were no other issues, it was okay. There are no frills or microwaves, and the rooms are standard hotel size, windows are not really sound proof - we heard a motorcycle outside going by. No plane noises. If visiting Miami airport, near Miami International and Dolphin Malls, this is a good spot to stay the night. Safe too.

Reviews.Title: “Good value , for Miami .”
Reviews.Author: kcsims99
Reviews.Content: I stayed here twice, once in feb of 2006 , and feb 13th 2009. It is improved from then. I've stayed in Miami 10 times, and this hotel is above average for this town. Clean rooms, flat screen tv's, and friendly staff. Close to the Dolphin Mall, and lots of restraunts. Only about 12 miles to the cruise ship port. Really a good value for a town with so many bad hotels. It was called Holiday Inn express at Doral.

Reviews.Title: “False advertising”
Reviews.Author: Librarymind
Reviews.Content: Whoever did the photography for this place sure knew how to make it look spacious and attractive. He or she also knew how to avoid the chipping paint, the squashed bugs on the walls, the mildew on the shower curtains, the dead light bulbs, and the small size of the rooms. The parking is free, but there's very little of it, and you have to walk all the way around the building back to the front again after parking in the back. The brochures show glowing pictures of full breakfasts, complete with ham, but it is a regular contintental breakfast. The person I made the reservation with, though not onsite, saw the pictures and told me what a great breakfast they had, and it was all an outright lie, because the pictures lie. The rooms are neither spacious nor well-lighted. Everyone here speaks Spanish, but that might be what's expected in Miami. If you don't have to visit Miami, don't. If you do, find a better hotel. This one is also 8 miles from Miami Beach. On the online map I looked at, the star to denote their hotel was right on Miami Beach. It's not there, it's in Doral, 8 miles west.

Reviews.Title: “Night before cruise - Great value, nice stay”
Reviews.Author: willwork4benefits
Reviews.Content: We spent Wed., July 9th at this hotel. Just a one night stay prior to a cruise. There is plenty of free parking. You can park your car for 14 days (free) and they provide a shuttle to the port @ $9/per person but not back to the hotel. We didnâ€™t use this feature, but it may be economical for some. There is a fountain out front and the lobby is very nice. The gym and dining area had a new feeling about them. The carpeting looked new on our hallway and in the room. There was a slight smell in the room, may have been the new carpet. The bedding was comfortable and fresh. The bathroom was clean and it seemed as if there were some new renovations including the vanity area. The gardens around the pool are very nice and we had the pool to ourselves. The breakfast is a nice plus with sausage, potatoes, and eggs, which were new to me. It was like a flat poached egg. I had never seen this before, but most people seemed to like them. There were various breads, pastries and fruits to choose from and the beverage choices, juices, teas, milk and coffee seemed vast. The coffee machine produced some wonderful and varied brews, highly recommended. One of the reasons for choosing this hotel were the decent reviews for a 2-star hotel especially for cleanliness, which is a must for me, and a refrigerator in the room. One of us requires refrigerated medicine. When I asked the front desk to put the very small portable fabric cooler in the kitchen freezer so that the ice packs would be ready in the morning, they accommodated us with a smile and I had no problem retrieving it the next day. Overall, this is a very nice hotel and I would stay there again for a short stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place and Pool”
Reviews.Author: JM11traveler
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Clarion Las Palmas because we wanted to use our free points with choice privileges, and we had a very nice room (414) with a pool view and comfortable beds. The pool was heated and good for an afternoon swim, they had a nice fitness center and continental breakfast. They also have 2 computers in the lobby that you can use for free. I would stay again if I am in the Miami Area do to the good service and amenities.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, great price”
Reviews.Author: CalgaryCruiser
Reviews.Content: Stayed the night of May 17/08. The hotel itself was very nice and the breakfast was very good. We had booked three rooms and were arriving at midnight prior to going on a cruise. When we checked-in we had a small problem - one room was totally unmade and one room was occupied. We called from the third room and the desk clerk came up with new room keys and escorted us to the new rooms with our luggage. One room was upgraded to a suite. The other problem was with the transfers to the port. Our travel agent had prepaid these transfers for us on her credit card. The hotel however had no record of this information. They did try to contact the travel agent on Sunday morning, however with a 3 hour time difference were unable to do so before we needed to leave for the ship. We had to pay the $7 per person ourselves. Still working to resolve this through the travel agent. Despite these small problems I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “its a jewel on the jungle”
Reviews.Author: florida907
Reviews.Content: Am a bussines man..and i had to fly to miami asap, i didnt have a reservation anywhere. doing a callaround in the area i found this perfect little hotel..it had a good price not that expensive but no that cheap.. i got there at 9 pm the front desk was absolutely helpfully they even gave a discount.. i had some questions about the area and they perfectly help me out. In the morning i got stunned when i found out the same front desk takes you to the airport. and thats a full costumer service...come on you dont see that every day. The breakfast was good but very crowd..they even have weights on the little fitting room and as i saw there is many bussines people staying in there the only problem is that they are located close to a main street and the traffic is horrible, so you better get up early so you wont catch rush hour. The driver alberto.told me its a two star ..but hey...with all this type of service it should be at least 4 star

Reviews.Title: “Would never stay at this hotel again.”
Reviews.Author: flyinghawk
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was incompetent. Upon arrival we requested a wake-up call and a 5:00 am shuttle to the airport. We didn't receive the wake-up call and the shuttle service was 15 minutes late in picking us up. The front desk make a few calls to make this happen. They advertise a 24-hour shuttle service. On our return to Miami, we called for shuttle service. The front-desk staff was uncaring. We called three times and the third time, no one would answer the phone. We waited 45 minutes for the shuttle to arrive at the airport and then the driver tossed us a paper into the backseat letting us know we would be staying at another hotel. We booked our stay in this hotel 3 months in advance. I also notified the front-desk clerk that we would be arriving late on our return flight. He told me there would be no problem.

Reviews.Title: “Better hotel, lower price”
Reviews.Author: ttbnf
Reviews.Content: I needed a place to stay for an extra night before a cruise so was really only looking for something clean with a comfortable bed and a cheap rate. I made a great choice when I booked this hotel. Because it's a smaller hotel, there aren't buses/cars constantly cruising the arrival area of the airport and you actually have to call the hotel upon arrival to get the complimentary shuttle. Seems like a fine system to me - I was picked up from the airport within 15 minutes of calling for a ride. When I arrived at the hotel there was a very friendly staff waiting to check me in. My room was large, bright and very clean. The view was of a somewhat busy stretch of road, but did also have some beautiful trees - which was the only thing I could see while lying in bed. The one negative thing I have to say about the hotel is about the 'fitness equipment'. It actually consists of a treadmill, an elliptical machine and a reclining stationary bike in a tiny room. Not really much of a fitness area but it was well air-conditioned with water and towels available. The complimentary breakfast the next morning was delicious and generous - everything from toast to pancakes to eggs. I stayed at the Miami Airport Hilton the next night and though the Hilton is swankier, I liked my room and the service at the Las Palmas much more. And, the Hilton was almost double the price. Overall, it was a great experience. Convenient location (less than 10 minute cab ride to the Dolphin Mall for all the outlet-shoppers and less than 15 minutes from the airport), fabulous service and a free breakfast. If I'm back in Miami, I'll stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: TomosSion
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one night before our cruise and paid Â£62.00 for the room and a continental breakfast included. The rooms were clean and the reception staff were very helpful. There is no restaurant on site but if you do have a car there are plenty just round the corner.

Reviews.Title: “Awful hotel”
Reviews.Author: kywoman11
Reviews.Content: My co-workers and I stayed at the Clarion hotel in Dec of 2007. It was an awful expereince. We arrived to the hotel late b/c our flight was delayed. The manager was very rude. Apparently the hotel was booked and they had to move us around. He was upset we came in late and very frustrated that he had to move the rooms around. We all requested non-smoking rooms and the rooms smelled heavily of cigarette smoke. One of my co-workers even had 5 full ashtrays in his room. Two of my co-workers had issues with their beds- sheets had not been changed and there were wrinkles in the bed like someone had been sleeping there. It was so bad that we moved to a hotel in Ft Lauderdale that was a lot further away.

Reviews.Title: “Not great.”
Reviews.Author: RhiaB
Reviews.Content: During other visits to Miami, I had passed this hotel, and from the outside it looked very nice. I needed to find a hotel for a one night stay in Miami and decided to give this hotel a try. It was more expensive then some of the other hotels I considered, so I was expected much more then what I got. The check-in process went okay, until I discovered that the request I made had not been met. I realize when making reservations, requests can not be guaranteed, but when I asked, he looked at me like he had no clue what I was talking about. He then started scanned his screen, so I got the impression that my request hadn't been fulfilled because he hadn't bother to read it. I then asked if the room had a microwave. He checked and then told me it didn't. So, I go up to the room, and discover that the room did have a microwave! Great! Until I discovered it didn't work. The room also didn't have a fridge. I purposely booked a room that listed a fridge. So I was disappointed. Called the front desk. To bad, nothing they can do. The next morning, I went to ask the front desk a question, but the clerk was too busy watching television (I think) and ignored me for about a full minute. All the employees I encountered during my stay were neither friendly, or helpful. The room itself was nicely decorated. A few stains, but nothing really bad. Although there was strong smell, clorox like. The pool was well kept, and there was a nice variety for breakfast. Overall, the room okay, the service terrible.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel near the Airport”
Reviews.Author: International2006
Reviews.Content: I paid $75-$100 per night (including tax) for this hotel using a special Expedia deal. This hotel is located in the Doral section of Miami. We stayed here for 2 nights before a cruise. We had a suite with a bedroom and living room. The suite had 2 TVs with a DVD player in one room. The room was clean and spacious. POSITIVES -Free hotel shuttle to the airport -Inexpensive shuttle to the cruise -Walking distance to Johnny Carinos Italian restaurant -Bus stop near the hotel (The local buses go to the airport and several shopping malls) -Aquarium filled with colorful fish in the lobby -Complimentary breakfast featuring sausage, juices, coffee, belgian waffles, assorted muffins, cereal, fruit and more. NEGATIVES -You need a car to get to major tourist attractions (South Beach, Bayside Marketplace, etc.) This is a great pre/post cruise hotel. It's also a good hotel if you have an early morning flight, since it's so close to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: tdog78
Reviews.Content: My room was pretty clean and everything was in good working condition. The one bad thing was that it was obvious somebody had smoked in the room even though it was a non-smoking room, so the smell lingered around the entire time. My room had a fridge and microwave, as well as two TVs. The continental breakfast was pretty standard fare, along with a waffle maker. It was very busy during breakfast time, however, and hard to find a table. The hotel is located close to many restaurants, and is a quick drive to the Airport. You can tell that they've been renovating, and some features seem outdated while others look very modern and clean. Some of the workers seemed to barely speak English, while others were very well spoken and helpful. It's kind of the luck of the draw as to what kind of service you'll get any time of the day. Overall, it's a good place to stay if you can get a good rate online.

Reviews.Title: “Loved Their Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: chertay
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Las Palmas prior to leaving on a cruise the next day. It wasn't a five star hotel, but it was definitely cleaner than the hotel we stayed at on South Beach when we returned from the cruise. What set them apart from everyone else is they helped us retreive our lost luggage from the airport. The airlines lost one of our bags and we were freaking out because the cruise left the next day. The airlines finally found it after about 6 hours and they were going to deliver it at 11:00 p.m. and it would arrive around 5:00 a.m. at the hotel if there weren't any problems. I called the front desk and asked if my husband could ride back to the airport with them when they went to pick up other guests so we could retrieve it ourselves and they said we didn't have to wait for that ......just call and let them know when we were ready to go. That way we didn't have to rely on the airline delivery service. They had already delivered us to the hotel in two trips since my husband had stayed at the airport trying to locate it. They were just awesome in offering their assistance! In all they made 3 trips to the airport for us! We would stay there again if we ever go on another cruise! Overall the value was good for the money we paid for it. Cherilyn Clark Flower Mound, TX

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: gm4pack
Reviews.Content: Got a good last minute deal via hotwire for an overnight layover in Miami. We arrived after 11pm. Make sure you call and confirm the shuttle. This can take a while as the hotel is about 15 minutes away, and on the return trip make sure the schedule the time as they have planned times not on demand shuttles. When we arrived with the hotel supposedly sold out, but the front desk was friendly and we got a room. Probably a back up room as it had ground floor view of a maintenance area, but none the less the room was comfortable although the air conditioner had been left at 58 degrees - cold. Breakfast area was crowded but had the standard warm and cold breakfast options. Overall a good value for a layover.

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Express Miami Airport Doral Area
HotelInfo.Address: 8436 NW 36th Street, Miami, FL 33166
